content: Do you know DiÃ¡taxis ? I am currently working on documentation with this orga for an API project. That's very interesting
This looks very familiar but I thought it had a different name. @Oliver Bertuch check this out. Four types of docs. Didn't you show us something similar a while back?
I have been spreading the word about it for a long time :smile: Also, I'm not sure who the original author is. I usually point to these folks: https://docs.divio.com/documentation-system/
Ah, "Origins and development. You can find an earlier presentation of some of these ideas, that I created while working at Divio between 2014-2021." -- https://diataxis.fr/colophon/
